content:
Netizen submissions
The Qingming Festival is approaching, and some netizens said that because the names of their ancestors contained sensitive words, their tomb-sweeping reservations were directly rejected by the local civil affairs system.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
It is reported that Pinduoduo disbanded the team that added malicious functions to the app 
Earlier, Pinduoduo was exposed to have added malicious functions such as privilege escalation in its app, which led to its ban by Google. According to anonymous employees, the company had formed a team of about 100 people to explore Android phone vulnerabilities and develop exploits. These malicious functions were initially only targeted at users in rural areas and small towns, and improved personalized push effects by collecting user data. The team was disbanded in early March and the vulnerability exploit code was removed. However, security experts pointed out that the underlying code could still be reactivated to perform attacks. 20 core network security engineers remained in the company.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
The introduction of the new Sinology doctoral program released by the China-Foreign Language Exchange and Cooperation Center of the Ministry of Education supports outstanding doctoral students registered at foreign universities to study in China, conduct joint research and write doctoral dissertations during their studies.
According to the internal documents provided by netizens, the funding for each student includes tuition, living allowance and research allowance, one international round-trip travel fee per year, medical and accident insurance during their stay in China, etc., totaling 160,000 yuan.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 4, Mr. Li Zhuang, a famous lawyer and party involved in the Chongqing "Li Zhuang case", released a video on Weibo to educate the public about illegal evidence.
It tells about torture and forced confession in a gang-related case in Li County, Baoding, and the details are horrifying.
He wrote on Weibo: "Seeking truth from facts and eliminating interference, Hebei Politics and Law has legally removed the black hat of a "gang-related case" and excluded two-thirds of the evidence obtained by illegal means. Thumbs up for themğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ»"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
At the recruitment meeting of Anxi Tea College of Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, the company blatantly recruited "KTV princesses" in the university.
On April 4, the school responded that the job list submitted by the company in question did not include "KTV princesses" and asked the company to leave the recruitment meeting or remove the KTV princess position.
In the end, the company chose to cover up the position on the roll-up banner and did not recruit KTV princesses on that day.

Recently, some netizens have submitted articles.
After only four months, the "epidemic" seems to have become an incorrect memory.
Whether it is the application of scientific research projects, the annual reports of listed companies, or ordinary small activities on campus, they are no longer allowed to be mentioned.

content:
Student contribution from Sun Yat-sen University
Because French President Emmanuel Macron will be giving a speech at Sun Yat-sen University on April 7, the school has urgently replaced all the squat toilets in the gymnasium with toilets.
